values.value: Lead Owner;Focus Vertical;Lead Source;Other Lead Source;Company;Website;Last Name;First Name;Email;Job Title;Role;Street;City;State;Zip/Postal Code;Country;Phone;Lead Segment;Shopping Cart;Oracle ID;Seller Name

Lead Upload Guide


Please use the .csv file below as a template to upload leads.

Please pay attention to the following details:

1) Lead Source, Company, First Name, Last Name are mandatory to populate. The other columns can be left blank.

2) For the Lead Owner column you will need to specify the user’s Salesforce ID, otherwise by default the user uploading will be the lead owner. Just the name of the user is not sufficient.

3) How to identify user’s Salesforce ID: Search for a user name in the top search bar -> click on the user profile -> you will get a URL with the following format: https://hive.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/User/0056A000000zavBQAQ/view

The value between “User/” and “/view” is the desired SF ID.

4) For Lead Segment, please use one of the following values: SMB, Enterprise, Brand, Distributor
